pkgmetadata.longdescription: I simple utility to sign http requests given some private keyTo run the python tests1. pip install -r requirements/test.txt2. nosetestsTo run the example using flask1. pip install -r requirements/example.txt2. python app.py3. open a browser and point to http://localhost:5000/After you invoke the GET request above you should see a request in the terminalGET /verify?__client_id=example&username=foo&password=bar&__signature=somestrangestuffhereThis shows the client in action but at this time our example does not truly verify the signed request
